channel.title: Thugscape
channel.description:
[center][green]Thug-scape Client By Thugscape[/green][/center] 3% To Delta Coul'nt have done it without your sprights. 8% To my friends that helped me code it. 87% To me for coding it. Hello. I spent some time working on this. If you leach it. Pleas Give me a little credit. If not i don't really care. Here is a list of the customs i added. Dragon Kite-8001 Dragon Platebody-13665 Dragon Claws-13664 Godsword Blade-13670 Bandos C'Bow-12233 Dragon C'Bow-9765 Bandos Full Helm-13211 Bandos Scimmy-15563 Dragon Pick-11611 Statius's Hammer-13643 Zaros Godsword-13214 Dragon Godsword-12217 Dark Wings-16041 [bold][red]Here Are All of the npcs[/red][/bold] 2998-Grim Reaper 2999-General Graardor 3002-Commander Zilyana 3003-Pirate Hat 3004-Dark Beast 3005-Iceman 3007-Kal Queen 3012-Kal Worker 3013-Kal Soldier 3014-Kal Guardian 3015-Kal Queen diff form 3015-Kal queen diff form 3017-The Kendal 3018-3022 Bears 3023-Tarn Razorlor 3026-Skeleton 3027-Candyland Pimp 3029-Floating Zombie 3034-Scream (from the movie scream. duh.) 3038-The Kraken(pirates of the carribbean fool.) 3039-Tree nymph 3040-Emo Kid 3045-Banana Monster 3046-Penance Fighter 3047-Anchor Monster 3048-Beast [size=15pt]SOME PICS[/size]
Loggin Screen [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hxrejp.jpg[/img]
Some awsome customs [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/206zvp1.jpg[/img]
DRAGON WAR AXE OWNS! [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2nun9d2.jpg[/img] Customs OWN [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/orih34.jpg[/img] Customs Rock :) [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/9jgjyu.jpg[/img] yay.
Well that is all the pics for now. I hope you like it. If i broke any rules. Pleas tell me in a comment. Thank you bi. Client link. http://uppit.com/FQ8AZT http://uppit.com/FQ8AZT
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2009, 09:03:24 pm[/size][hr]This is my first Client. Tell me if you like it in a comment pleas. If i broke any rules. pleas tell me.

item.title: Thugscape
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“noobofiyer, post:22, topic:265701”][quote author=Master~Coder link=topic=350795.msg2695969#msg2695969 date=1236281448]
lol sprights? learn to spell before you leach.
same goes for you tabby…

It’s Sprites.

Thug get adobe [you can find a lot of cracks]

Then design a nice background.

2nd Make your OWN sprites - don’t use deltascapes

3rth

[size=7pt]3% To Delta Coul’nt have done it without your sprights.
8% To my friends that helped me code it.
87% To me for coding it.[/size]

Wtf 87% for coding yourself? you just took a clientbase and added items and changed the SPRITES.

If i were you I would start from back. and note the things i have said.

AND GIVE THE CLIENTBASE creds…

Nerd.

And I advice you to take a good look at Fubergens client - This is good work -

Maybe you will learn something from it.
[/quote]

Mate chill down… he tryes it atleast i dont see u makeing a source. :)[/quote]

Master~coder shut up like really and why do you say nerd? your a nerd to so shut up

Read full topic
